Welcome!

It has been far too long since your last physical stay here. Have a look at what changed in the meantime. To move around, use the arrow keys. Shift allows you to gather some speed.

You will surely encounter some friends along the way. When you approach them, you will be able to talk to up to three of them in a video call. In some rooms, you can have an open discussion with an almost unlimited number of people. We marked these with a special symbol.

These are the rules:

To maintain our university's welcoming and open atmosphere, we demand you to follow some guidelines.

  1. Do talk about UniAdventure.
  2. Be excellent to each other.
  3. Act respectfully and treat others with dignity.
  4. No hate speech or obscene names.
  5. Call for help where necessary.

We would love to hear your thoughts!

Leave your first impression, your creative ideas, and the bugs you spotted in the register below.

Who built this?

The ERBA part of our UniAdventure is a project by Fachschaft WIAI in cooperation with enthusiastic individuals. If you would like to become part of the project, have a look at our Github repository or drop us a message (via email or in our virtual register above).

Also, check out the wonderful Workadventure project providing the game engine that runs our map.

There are plenty of places to discover at the ERBA island. Look out for signs on the floor and curious objects. And now, let's go for a stroll!
